aspirante._no_tiene_cupo_sector_: You have already filled your quota for the sector
aspirante._no_cupo_ninguna_carrera_elegida_aspiran: There is no space in any of the courses chosen by the applicant
aspirante._seleccion_descripcion_: Select the applicants who will be accepted as students
aspirante._ha_sido_msj_: We are pleased to inform you that you have been
aspirante._si_esta_de_acuerdo_msj_: If you agree with the selection, click the button below to

auth._enlace_restablecer_clave_enviado_: A reset link will be sent if the account exists.
auth._ingrese_datos_para_crear_cuenta_aspiran: Enter your information below to create your account as a candidate for a career or certification.
auth._ingrese_email_clave_para_conectarse_: Enter your email and password below to log in
auth._ingrese_email_para_restablecer_: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
auth._ingrese_nueva_clave_: Please enter your new password below
auth._verificar_email_mensaje_: Please verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you.
auth._verificacion_reenviado_: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.

carrera._codigo_ya existe_: The career code already exists in another registry
carrera._permite_gestionar_: Allows you to manage career data
carrera._sedes_ayuda_: Locations where the degree is taught

_carga_completa_borrar_anteriores_: Full load, delete existing data from previous loads
_confirmar_borrar_registro_: Confirm to delete the selected record

convocatoria._calendarizar_descripcion_: Schedule the activities carried out in the application process
convocatoria._convocatoria_a_utilizar_para_enviar_inv: Application process to be used for sending invitations
convocatoria._cuota_sector_publico_hint_: Percentage of places assigned to public sector students
convocatoria._fecha_publicacion_resultados_hint_: Date from which applicants will be able to see if they were selected
convocatoria._listado_actividades_: List of activities of the application process
convocatoria._oferta_descripcion_: Select the locations with the respective courses that will be offered in the application process
convocatoria._oferta_indicaciones_: Select the location and then the courses you wish to include in the application process.
convocatoria._seleccion_tipo1_: Only the first option career will be chosen, considering the highest grades
convocatoria._seleccion_tipo2_: Any course with a quota will be taken in the order in which the applicant chose them, starting with the students with the highest grades.

_consejo_cuerpo_mensaje_: Message that will be sent by email when invitations to the call are made
_editar_datos_registro_seleccionado_: Editar los datos del registro seleccionado

estado._permite_gestionar_datos_: Allows you to manage the status of the stages of processes and requests

_estudiantes_candidatos_carrera_universi: Students who are candidates to study in university courses

etapa._permite_gestionar_datos_: Allows you to manage the stages of the processes

_enviar_invitaciones_bachilleres_: Send invitations to high school students

grado._codigo_ya existe_: The degree code already exists in another record
grado._permite_gestionar_grados_: Allows you to manage the data of the degree awarded by a career

ingreso._debe_seleccionar_al_menos_una_carrera_: You must select at least one career
ingreso._no_eleccion_carreras_alternativas_: You haven't selected both alternative career paths. Do you wish to continue without completing your alternative career path selection?
ingreso._revise_informacion_: Review the selected data and, if it is correct, click the save button. Once saved, you will not be able to edit it.
ingreso._seleccion_carreras_indicacion_: Select the degree you wish to study. You can select three degrees in order of preference. The first degree will be your main degree, and the other two will be used if you are not selected for the first degree.
ingreso._seleccion_convocatoria_indicacion_: Select the application process in which you will participate
ingreso._seleccion_sede_indicacion_: Select the location where you want to study
ingreso._suba_archivo_calificaciones_estudiantes: Upload the file with the grades obtained
ingreso._cargar_calificaciones_indicaciones_: The file with the grades must contain at least two columns: 'nie' and 'calificacion'

invitacion._no_se_pudo_realizar_envio_: The shipment could not be made

_invitaciones_se_enviaran_si_tiene_corre: Invitations will only be sent to high school students who have a registered email address
_no_se_pudo_guardar_formulario_: The form could not be saved.
_no_tiene_permiso_para_esta_accion_: You do not have permission to perform this action
_no_tiene_permiso_para_realizar_ninguna_: You are not allowed to perform any action
_permite_gestionar_datos_convocatorias_: Allows you to manage application process data

sede._codigo_ya existe_: The locations code already exists in another record
sede._permite_gestionar_sedes_: Allows you to manage data from university locations

_si_no_elije_opcion_mostrara_todas_: If you do not choose any option, candidates for all types of high school will be displayed.

solicitud._mensaje_crear_solicitud_: Please confirm that you wish to start the application process.

_solo_estudiantes_para_carreras_universi: Only for high school students who are required for university degrees
_solo_invitaciones_no_enviadas_anteriorm: Only invitations that have not been sent previously
_suba_archivo_datos_estudiantes_bachille: Upload a CSV file containing high school student data.

tipoCarrera._codigo_ya existe_: The career type code already exists in another record
tipoCarrera._permite_gestionar_tipos_carrera_: Allows you to manage data on the type of career

tipoFlujo._permite_gestionar_datos_: Allows you to manage the types of processes

transicion._permite_gestionar_datos_: Allows you to manage transitions between process stages

_verifique_que_ha_subido_archivo_csv_: Verify that you have uploaded a CSV file, with {tab} as the field separator
